Sydney Opera House

VIP tour of Sydney Opera House Concert Hall with G.H.Mumm Champagne tasting.

Spoil a loved one or mum with the exclusive behind the scenes access to the Sydney Opera House with a tasting of the world's finest champagne.

More... Less

Sydney, Australia

2.5 hours

05/14/2023 4:30 PM

Sydney Opera House Map it

* Please select an option

Subtotal US$122*

Add to cart

*The price shown is an approximate conversion. You will be charged in the local merchants currency at checkout. Other currency conversion and bank fees may apply.

Share Contact us

The Experience

Sydney Opera House is turning 50 and ready to party. So, what more iconic way for you and your loved one to celebrate than joining a very special VIP tour of Australia's very own UNESCO World Heritage listed icon. Whether it be for Mother's Day with mum, or for an anniversary with that special someone, the fun doesn't end there! The exclusive tour is followed by a G.H.Mumm Champagne tasting led by one of their expert Champagne Ambassadors in an intimate venue under the renowned sails.

What's priceless?

Savouring Champagne and canaps amongst the beauty of the UNESCO World Heritage listed Sydney Opera House.

The highlights

  • Exclusive tour of the Sydney Opera House

  • Uncover the stories and history of the iconic building in its 50thyear

  • Enjoy a private G.H.Mumm tasting experience with paired canaps

  • VIP access Pernod Ricard's online offer platform

...More Less

Details

  • Offer exclusive for 18+ Mastercard cardholders

  • 1 unit is equivalent to 1person

  • Arrive 4:15pm for a 4:30pm tour

  • 5:30pm tasting (end of event 7:00pm)

  • G.H.Mumm Champagne tasting

  • Paired menu of canaps

  • Additional dates to be confirmed

  • Experience will be 2.5 hours long

  • General Terms and Conditions for Tickets and Attendance at Events

  • By clicking "Add to cart", you agree to all our Terms of Use
  • Terms & Conditions

Fine Print

  • This experience is non-refundable upon purchase, unless otherwise noted

  • This experience is non-refundable upon purchase, unless otherwise noted

  • Experience is available for guests of 18 years and older

  • This experience is non-refundable after scheduling is complete

  • Must follow required COVID-19 protocols

  • Guests may be required to wear a mask and maintain social distancing when attending

  • Flat, enclosed, rubber-soled shoes must be worn. Please make sure you are on time as latecomers may not be able to join the tour. Tour route will vary depending on access to venues on the relevant evening

  • Experience will be scheduled on a mutually agreeable date and time, based on partner's availability

  • Experience must be booked at least 10 days prior to May 14th

  • Experience is in English

  • SOH terms and conditions apply. See more informationhere.

  • Please reach out to the Priceless Concierge Team atpriceless@mccann.com.auif you have any questions
